h2_title: Earth Wolf Miniboss Fight and Guide
content: It will often start the fight with a leaping attack, using its head to ram into you as it rolls when it hits the ground. Wait until it comes crashing down to dodge, then move along with it to keep attacking as it rights itself.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Earth_Wolf.md', within the main section titled 'Earth Wolf', specifically from the subsection 'Earth Wolf Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
It will often start the fight with a leaping attack, using its head to ram into you as it rolls when it hits the ground. Wait until it comes crashing down to dodge, then move along with it to keep attacking as it rights itself.
